work-item.field:
First we will create a wiki page "[YOUR NAME] Defect Dashboard" (Your name might be necessary if you work all together at the same project) which will give us some information about all defects and their priority.
  • Add Title for you report
  • Add Subheadings for every priority enumeration
  • Use workitems macro to display defects for each priority
    • display fields: id,title,status,priority,assignee,timePoint,initialEstimate
    • sort by descending order: priority as first level sorting and status as second level sorting
